resources.string: This app is built to help you access the research you need. You can use our features both inside and outside the app. When you can\’t afford a paper bit the button inside the app, or share the page you\'re on to the app from outside the app.
•List of popular myths and counter arguments
•Reasons for publishing your research open online
Simply push the button in the app or use the share button in any browser to report a paywall.
Our interactive map displays people being denied access to research they both needed to pay for and their stories.
Alternatively, touch here to Sign Up with Social Media
Alternatively, touch here to Sign In with Social Media
Already registered? Then touch here to Sign In.
Tell us why and we will put you on the map.
e.g. I am trying to save lives, dammit!
For instructions, more info and your contribution head to www.openaccessbutton.org
Does Open Access have reliable peer review?
Simple Answer: Yes. A strong community of experts exists in order to support Open Access publishing. They delegate their time to the cause and are just as reliable as the ones of paid journals.
Touch for more information on the topic.
Touch on the button above to be taken straight into the app.
Question not answered below? Ask one here.
Touch to close the question form.
No worries. Just enter your email address and we will send you a link to create a new one.
We have now emailed you instructions on resetting your password. Please check your email address for further instructions.
Your question is now submitted. You will receive an answer via your email within a few days. Thank you for your patience
Error: the two passwords don\'t match

Welcome to our app. We are a small company that aims to provide tools and research for Open Access research advocates. Our aim is that one day all research is openly available for the public and not stuck behind a paywall.
Thanks for downloading the Open Access Button. Swipe right to find out how to use the app.
You can\'t submit a blank question!
We can help you get access to research.
Push Button. Get Research. Make Progress.
Next time your by your computer login to your account and see if we\’ve found you access.
Inside we\’ve packed a huge amount of information about Open Access. Use our FAQ and guides to answer your questions, and if you have more leftover submit them to us!
Why not keep this app by your side next time you discussing Open Access with your friends and professors?
If we all work together soon everyone will have access to research by default.
If you want to help yourself, and others around the world we\’ll send you great actions and opportunities every now and then.
You must enter an email address!
That username or password is invalid!
Here\'s some research I\'ve been looking at…
Sorry that email address has already been registered
We prefer you use your real name. If you\'d like to maintain privacy don\'t use your real name as your username as it will be publicly displayed.
